job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: We at neteffects are looking for a motivated Data Scientist for our direct client.No C2C but Neteffects sponsor work visas. This is a Remote position.Required Skills: â¢ Ph.D. (or MS with 4+ years of post MS experience) in Statistics, Geo-statistics, Mathematics or closely related field. â¢ 2 years of experience in using machine learning, artificial intelligence & statistical methodologies to solve research problems. â¢ Proficiency in Python or in another high-level programming language. â¢ Experience in developing statistical, and machine learning models for environmental and agronomical applications. â¢ Experience analyzing and presenting complex data and proven problem-solving abilities. â¢ Strong organizational, interpersonal, and written communication skills.  Desired Skills: â¢ Experience working with agricultural/biological scientific data is highly desired. â¢ Experience working with various environmental data and categorizing environmental variabilities using geospatial model and approach is highly desired. â¢ Familiarity with geospatial data and tools and techniques required to explore geospatial data is highly desired. â¢ Familiarity with deep learning architectures and techniques as well as constructing and evaluating these models. â¢ Drive for translating business problems into research initiatives that deliver business value. â¢ Creativity in defining challenging exploratory projects.
